title: Adbitco
author: Adbitco
content: Today being 18 of June, the Relictum (GNT) Team has officially announced their native currency to be traded on Ledger Bank exchange known to be the TOP 20 of the world's cryptocurrency exchanges, an Asian recognized trading exchange according to CoinMarketCap, as well as in the TOP 25 of the CoinGecko rating in terms of trading volume with a daily turnover exceeding $2.8 bln. According to their research.For those looking for a way to acquire their native currency, this is a good news for you get to keep your usdt to buy.Trading start on 29 of September 2022. I see the potential in this project so I decided to have much of it and waiting for the listing date though I planned to hold for long as they have their blockchain which many projects will be built inside using their network configuration.
